title: Authme和Discuz数据对接报错
author: 帅杀风云110
txt_content:
我已经检查过填写的信息都是正确的，不存在密码错误之类的问题
开服时Authme连接MySQL时报错，然后服务器不久后就会重启
报错信息如下：28.06 21:05:11 [Server] INFO [AuthMe] Enabling AuthMe v5.3.1-b1702
28.06 21:05:12 [Server] INFO [AuthMe] Connection arguments loaded, Hikari ConnectionPool ready!

28.06 21:05:43 [Server] INFO The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
